books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: Jesus’ life and times, and the events leading up to his execution.
books.name: KILLING JESUS

books.author: by Brandon Stanton
books.description: Four hundred color photos of New Yorkers, with brief commentary by Stanton.
books.name: HUMANS OF NEW YORK

books.author: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
books.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who advocated for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
books.name: I AM MALALA

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: How disadvantages can work in our favor; from the author of "The Tipping Point" and "Outliers."
books.name: DAVID AND GOLIATH

books.author: by Henry Bushkin
books.description: A recollection by Carson’s lawyer and confidant for 18 years.
books.name: JOHNNY CARSON

books.author: by Elizabeth Smart with Chris Stewart
books.description: A woman kidnapped by religious fanatics from her Utah home in 2002 at age 14 describes her captivity and rescue nine months later.
books.name: MY STORY

books.author: by Naoki Higashida
books.description: A 13-year-old boy with autism answers questions.
books.name: THE REASON I JUMP

books.author: by Bill Bryson
books.description: The author of "A Short History of Nearly Everything" describes the events of the summer of 1927: Charles Lindbergh’s trans-Atlantic flight, Babe Ruth’s 60 homers, the great Mississippi flood.
books.name: ONE SUMMER

books.author: by Piper Kerman
books.description: A memoir by a Brooklyn woman whose relationship with a drug runner gets her sentenced to a year in prison. The basis for the Netflix series, originally published in 2010.
books.name: ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK

books.author: by Si Robertson with Mark Schlabach
books.description: Tales from Phil’s youngest brother, retired from the Army, who works in the Duck Commander workshop.
books.name: SI-COLOGY 1

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Brad Stone
books.description: The story of Jeff Bezos and Amazon.
books.name: EVERYTHING STORE

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A former member of the Navy SEALs discusses his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war. Kyle was shot to death in Texas in February.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER
